Scenario: A six-way tie with only one seat available

OPL
1 seats
12 ballots cast
6 candidates

Pike,D    2 votes
Foster,D  2 votes
Deutsch,R 2 votes
Borg,R    2 votes
Jones,R   2 votes
Smith,I   2 votes

[Pike,D]    -- Any of these following should be able
[Foster,D]    -- to win the coin flip. It also should
[Deutsch,R]   -- have a good spread of results.
[Borg,R]
[Jones,R]
[Smith,I]

Tie-breaker to break six-way tie is needed here.
